CIPHER.0.cipherString: I love my career right now, and I won't be with anybody until they make my life as satisfying and as happy as my work makes me.

CIPHER.1.cipherString: This experience has also humbled me by giving me a true understanding of what millions of others face each day in their own fight against cancer.

CIPHER.2.cipherString: Each child is an adventure into a better life - an opportunity to change the old pattern and make it new.

CIPHER.3.cipherString: I've played Hamlet and Coriolanus, Orlando in 'As You like It' and Ariel in 'Tempest,' among others.

CIPHER.4.cipherString: If you made a list of reasons why any couple got married, and another list of the reasons for their divorce, you'd have a hell of a lot of overlapping.

CIPHER.5.cipherString: I'm definitely interested in making more music and uploading new covers; I like to take suggestions because it's more fun if people know the song.

CIPHER.6.cipherString: Only if you have been in the deepest valley, can you ever know how magnificent it is to be on the highest mountain.

CIPHER.9.cipherString: I wouldn't want to try to adapt something of my own. It would be like going back to school and doing all my exams again.

CIPHER.10.cipherString: Whatever poet, orator or sage may say of it, old age is still old age.

CIPHER.11.cipherString: Treat everyone the way you would want to be treated... this can be applied to any situation.
